form.usernameMinMessage: Your username must be at least 3 characters.
form.usernameMaxMessage: Your username must be up to 20 characters.
form.passwordMinMessage: Your password must be at least 6 characters.
form.passwordMaxMessage: Your password must be up to 18 characters.
form.confirmPasswordNoMatch: Please make sure the passwords are the same.

home.title: We're here for your most beautiful journeys.
home.introduction:
Hello, welcome to

Wander Wheels

. Traveling has become easier and more enjoyable. With our wide range of vehicles, competitive prices, and reliable service, we're here to offer you the best travel experience possible.
home.invite: <link_1>Login</link_1> or <link_2>Sign Up</link_2> now and take the first step towards your dream journey by choosing from our extensive fleet of vehicles. Are you ready to hit the road?
